content: I first heard about his passing this morning and it hit me fairly solidly! I've always enjoyed listening to him (even when I know he was embelishing), but haven't been able to listen as much lately! I have thought that over the past months since his wife (Angel) passed, that he wasn't completely "in the now" and I had actually been anticipating it! He will be missed! I do hope that his son and his "stand-in" continue the program, however! It is not our belief or disbelief that can make or unmake the fact. ~ Thomas Paine
